title: Gal Gadot
summary: Gal Gadot-Varsano[8][9][10] (Hebrew: גל גדות‎ [ˈɡal ɡaˈdot];[11] born (1985-04-30)30 April 1985)[12] is an Israeli actress and model. At age 18, she was crowned Miss Israel 2004. She then served two years in the Israel Defense Forces as a soldier, whereafter she began studying at the IDC Herzliya college, while building her modeling and acting careers.[13][7][14]
